Ward Island (also known as Wards Island) is a small island in the Sacramento–San Joaquin River Delta. It is part of San Joaquin County, California. Its coordinates are , and the United States Geological Survey measured its elevation as  in 1981. It appears on a 1952 USGS map of the area.
}}
